nodes.text: Orion Ferret's shuttle was a small spacecraft owned by disreputable weapons trader Orion Ferret. The shuttle was docked at space station Bazarre, Ferret's base of operations. Luke Skywalker and Lando Calrissian used the hyperdrive-equipped shuttle to travel from Bazarre to Patch-4 to retrieve four TIE/LN starfighters they purchased from Ferret.

The shuttle had a remote ejection system that Ferret considered using to get rid of the two Rebels and keep their money, the TIEs and the Millennium Falcon. Though Calrissian and Skywalker were nearly killed on Patch-4, they eventually returned the shuttle to Bazarre. The shuttle was also equipped with a tractor beam that was used to tow the TIE fighters from Patch-4.
